summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKitsch Taming Wand smoothes and settles annoying flyaways so your buns and ponies look sleek and baby hair-free. The final touch to any polished hairstyle, this Taming Wand wand is cute and easy to carry, so you can whip it out any time you have a few wild wisps.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly tames frizz, flyaways, and baby hairs while boosting shine2-in-1 product can also be used to tame unruly browsSerum-like gel keeps hairs in place all day without feeling stiffFeaturesLightweight, clear formula smoothes strands without stickiness or white residueEnriched with nourishing biotin, aloe vera, and vitamin E for added hydrationCompact packaging makes it easy to style on the goEach 18ml tube is equivalent to approximately 290 applications*Free of parabens, phosphates, phthalates, silicones, sulfates, SLES, SLS, and triclosanItem 2638317How To UseStyle hair as desired, then glide spoolie over flyaways, frizz, and edges for a smooth, polished finish.Pro Tip: Use with Kitsch Bun Twists to create the perfect, slicked-back ballerina bun.Precautions: For external use only.Avoid contact with eyes & lips. Before use, start with a patch test on the inner armor side of the neck to check for skin sensitivity.Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Not for sensitive skin. Keep out of reach of children.Please store product at cool condition (86'F), away from direct heat and sunlight.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, PVP, Alcohol Denat., Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin, Biotin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Maltodextrin, Denatonium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate
how_to_use: Style hair as desired, then glide spoolie over flyaways, frizz, and edges for a smooth, polished finish.Pro Tip: Use with Kitsch Bun Twists to create the perfect, slicked-back ballerina bun.Precautions: For external use only.Avoid contact with eyes & lips. Before use, start with a patch test on the inner armor side of the neck to check for skin sensitivity.Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Not for sensitive skin. Keep out of reach of children.Please store product at cool condition (86'F), away from direct heat and sunlight.

reviews.headline: Cheap Alternative - Takes Forever to Apply
reviews.comments:
I purchased this as a less expensive alternative to a similar product I buy from a different brand.  I was very disappointed with it.  The styling wand is absolutely terrible - it hardly gets any product on it each time you pull it from the tube and it takes forever to actually apply it as a result.  The other product I use has a much better application brush and I can tame my frizz and flyaways in seconds, where as with this product, it takes me a good 2-3 minutes to get enough applied.

I rated it two starts because yes, it does help tame my frizz and flyaways, but the design and execution of the product is horrible and I won't buy it again.

reviews.headline: Useful Item that Yields a Well-groomed Look
reviews.comments: Usually I use elf clear mascara to tame fly-aways, but this product offers a larger tube and works even better. Smooths broken hairs down without leaving a greasy appearance.

faceoff_positive.comments: If I would known about this serum sooner, I would've already bought one. Have a long hair and I usually wear it in the ponytail. When it's freshly washed, I have a million fly aways, and it's hard to maintain those. Was always wondering how some athletes or ice skating ladies have a nice bun and the hair on their top of their head is like glued down, doesn't move and stays flat. When I got this serum, I was curious. Tried it right away. Have to add that the tube was 90% empty and I was struggling to scrape some product on the wand. Then I started to pull the wand down from my forehead, catching every single hair, which was standing up. The serum is enriched with biotin, aloe vera and vitamins, which are acting soothing and nourishing. I was amazed by the results. No fly aways, no invisible little hairs, no more uncontrollable hair. The packaging is perfect for traveling, if we need a quick fix, even on the go. It really helps maintain my stubborn hair.
faceoff_positive.headline: Slicked back hairstyle
